name: 太阳下的魔鬼Devil under sun
name_original: 太阳下的魔鬼Devil under sun
description:
Take you back to the terrible history...
In the shadow of the war, the Japanese 731 troops openly violated public international law.
ongoing····
Biochemical experiment····

=================== Game Content and Features =========================

1. History-based games..
2. There are up to 8 hours of game time in the game.
There are many options in the game that determine the ending and mission of the game.
4. horror game experience.
5. The default game is actually the window launch.
Alt + Enter toggles the window mode between full screen and full screen.
6. The game has more than three game endings.
7. There is a game guide in the game, you don't have to worry about getting into trouble in the game.
8. There is great music in the game.
